title: Guinness Book of Records
additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. The American edition was known as the Guinness Book of World Records, and may have been published close in time to the British edition after its introduction in 1956.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
